recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes with syrup and butter.
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk milk and eggs together.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Heat a skillet and add butter.
Pour batter and cook until golden on both sides.

recipes.title: Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs and milk in a bowl.
Heat a skillet and melt butter.
Sauté bell peppers and onions until soft.
Pour egg mixture into the skillet.
Cook until eggs are set, then fold and serve.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Healthy avocado toast with a poached egg.
instructions: Toast the bread slices.
Mash avocado and spread over the toast.
Poach the egg and place it on top of the avocado.
Season with salt, pepper, and chili flakes.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Classic Caesar salad with homemade dressing.
instructions: Wash and chop lettuce.
Mix olive oil, egg yolk, mustard, garlic, and lemon juice for dressing.
Toss lettuce with dressing, croutons, and Parmesan.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
recipes.description: Juicy grilled chicken sandwich with veggies.
instructions: Season chicken breast with salt and pepper.
Grill chicken until fully cooked.
Spread mayonnaise on bread slices.
Assemble sandwich with lettuce, tomato, and grilled chicken.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Hearty spaghetti with rich meat sauce.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in marinara sauce and season with salt and pepper.
Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add milk, eggs, oil, and vanilla. Mix well.
Pour batter into a greased pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes.

recipes.title: Brownies
recipes.description: Chewy chocolate brownies with a rich flavor.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Melt butter and mix with sugar, eggs, and vanilla.
Add cocoa powder, flour, and salt. Mix until smooth.
Pour batter into a greased pan.
Bake for 20-25 minutes.

recipes.title: Cheesecake
recipes.description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.
instructions: Mix graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and melted butter. Press into a pan.
Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well.
Pour mixture over crust and bake at 325°F (160°C) for 40-45 minutes.
